fields.value: Variations in the Diffusion of State Lottery Adoptions:  How Revenue Dedication Changes Morality Politics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The article investigates the different causes funded by  state lotteries. Both lotteries that fund education and those that provide general revenue are examined.
